title: India's policy may tilt towards faster economic expansion post general elections: Barclays
description: Barclays, a British multinational investment bank, has said that India's policy may shift towards faster economic growth after the general elections in 2024. The bank expects the new government to aim for GDP growth of 8-9% without compromising on macro stability.

title: From Joe Biden To Sunak: When Will G20 Leaders Land In India And Who Will Welcome Them
description: India is hosting the G20 Leaders' Summit in New Delhi on September 9-10, 2023. The summit will see the participation of leaders from 19 countries and the European Union. The US President Joe Biden, the UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak, the German Chancellor Angela Merkel, and the French President Emmanuel Macron are among the prominent guests.

title: President Of Bharat: G20 Dinner Invite Sparks Row
description: The G20 dinner invite sparks a row over the term 'President of Bharat'.

title: Stalin Junior Defiant Over 'Sanatana' Remark, Cites President, Mahabharat

title: 'If We Call Alliance Bharat...': Arvind Kejriwal On 'Renaming' Row
